message:
السلام عليكم ..
انا تقريبا من سنه ونص وانا بدرس من علي الانترنت html5 , javascript , jquery , bootsrtap لغايه الحمد لله بقيت تقريبا متمكن فيهم المرحله الجايه ليا مش عارف تكون ايه انا عاوز اطلع من مرحلة الديزاين لدوفولوببر ادرس php ,ولا ايه وهل لازم ادرس داتا بيز لو خلصت php  برجاء الافاده شكرا

data.message: You can be developer using only javascript nowadays, like someone asked here 3 days earlier :) and if you decided to be a backend developer, you can write server-side services using node.js on any database you like such as MySQL, mssql, nonsql...etc
so your recommendations node.js  is better than php ?
Time saving wise, yes. It's super lite and you won't need another language to learn
so , do i have to learn data base after i think ?
Yes, learning database always great again, if you want to be backend as well
thanks you have been very helpful :)

Learning database also teaches you how to analysis your project data and how to plan them to fit the whole solution. You will need database in just any software you are going to develope. Game, media site, web app, mobile app, desktop app... Etc
Beltawfee2
RUBY ON RAILS
Python.

Ruby and python are great espcially Ruby, i mean technical wise. but both has no market in Egypt.
PHP or .net to have a good chance in work

من رأي تدرس  ASP.NET لان الماركت بتاعها واسع في مصر دا غير ان هيبقى معاك لغة برمجة وهي السي شارب وتقدر ساعتها تدخل في برمجة الموبايل او الويندوز ابليكشن وهيبقى اسمك مبرمج وتقدر تنتقل لاي لغة برمجة اخرى بسهوله 
اما لو درس PHP فأنت زنقت نفسك في مجال الويب فقط

Hesham Mohamed Eladawy
Ruby on Rails has a market in Egypt. It has been a scarce skill that was hard to find for every Egyptian company that I know was interested in.

You even can write the database queries in JavaScript & store your data as JSON documents with MongoDB. :)
Now, with JavaScript you can be a full stack developer.
I also recommend that give AngularJS a try.
===
On another track, give some considerations for learning mobile development (Android or iOS).
See this: https://www.slideshare.net/slideshow/embed_code/40841467#
He can write full time mobile apps with js,CSS,html5... thanks to Cordova, phonegap, Intel xdk...etc
cross plat forms you mean ?!! 2 weaks ago i found ruby on  rails very interesting ,but afriend of mine give me an advise that here in egypt rarely if any one ask for ruby developers
ruby us great and many companies and startups already using it in their projects, the only concern here is time-wise, you already got set of powerful tools to start with.

Hosam Aly ,ya there is a market but still very very limitd.
you cant name five companies in egypt workin with it :)

Hesham Mohamed Eladawy
I can, but I know that's not your point. :-)
There is limited demand, but supply is not enough. And the demand is growing.

Besides, Ruby on Rails is worth learning even if you don't use it. It's the best Web framework that I have used until now, and I have used plenty. There is a lot to be learned from it.
agree
